PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ReinforcementBarPitchOfWall
PropertySetDef.Definition: The pitch length information of reinforcement bar with the wall.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types and no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.IFC4.3.0.0 DEPRECATION The Reference property is deprecated and shall no longer be used, use attribute Name on the relating type instead.

PropertyDef.Name: BarAllocationType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the type of the reinforcement bar allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: VerticalBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the vertical bar.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the horizontal bar.

PropertyDef.Name: SpacingBarPitch
PropertyDef.Definition: The pitch length of the spacing bar.
